quote: I want to encourage more people in small villages to take up sports.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: You don't really grow up until you quit playing sports.
name: Richard Linklater

quote: I'll let the racket do the talking.
name: John McEnroe

quote: Tennis was a white, upper-class sport, and I wanted it to be treated like other sports were.
name: John McEnroe

quote: It is almost impossible to remember how tragic a place the world is when one is playing golf.
name: Robert Wilson Lynd

quote: I wasn't into sports, but I was really into Shakespeare.
name: Frances McDormand

quote: Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners, only survivors.
name: Frank Gifford

quote: I'm a competitive person and I love the challenge of mastering new things.
name: Sasha Cohen

quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty.
name: Harry Vardon

quote: What's a good tournament for him? Winning it. He's good enough.
name: Greg Norman

quote: The ban on sports betting does exactly what Prohibition did. It makes criminals rich.
name: James Surowiecki

quote: There are two theories on hitting the knuckleball. Unfortunately, neither of them works.
name: Charley Lau

quote: I was always a mean and lean athlete - not tall - not large.
name: Edwin Moses

quote: I overcame size with mechanics.
name: Edwin Moses

quote: The trouble with jogging is that the ice falls out of your glass.
name: Martin Mull

quote: I went through baseball as 'a player to be named later.'
name: Joe Garagiola

quote: Baseball is drama with an endless run and an ever-changing cast.
name: Joe Garagiola

quote: We all idolize sports figures, and we see them fall from grace. You just truly never know anybody anymore.
name: Rich Eisen

quote: The only athletic sport I ever mastered was backgammon.
name: Douglas William Jerrold

quote: When we grew up, we wanted to do two things: to own a sports team and a casino.
name: Dan Gilbert

quote: I'm not buddy-buddy with the players. If they need a buddy, let them buy a dog.
name: Whitey Herzog

quote: Badminton in Beijing is huge - it's one of their top three sports.
name: Howard Bach

quote: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing.
name: Greg LeMond

quote: He hits the ball a long way and he knows how to win.
name: Gary McCord

quote: You know they're not going to lose 162 consecutive games.
name: Harry Caray

quote: In football, time and space are the same thing.
name: Graham Taylor

quote: Olympism is the marriage of sport and culture.
name: Juan Antonio Samaranch

quote: Football is violence and cold weather and sex and college rye.
name: Roger Kahn

quote: I was showing early symptoms of becoming a professional baseball man. I was lying to the press.
name: Roger Kahn

quote: Tennis and golf are best played, not watched.
name: Roger Kahn

quote: Baseball is a man maker.
name: Al Spalding

quote: I got into sports, thankfully, because I didn't listen to my mother.
name: Dat Nguyen

quote: Have you ever noticed what golf spells backwards?
name: Al Boliska

quote: The bell that tolls for all in boxing belongs to a cash register.
name: Bob Verdi

quote: What's unfortunate about buying a pitcher for $12 million is that he carries no warranty.
name: Bob Verdi

quote: Competition is the spice of sports; but if you make spice the whole meal you'll be sick.
name: George Leonard

quote: The difference in golf and government is that in golf you can't improve your lie.
name: George Deukmejian
